channel.title: Some questions the professionals please help me!
channel.description:
hello everyone, ive got some questions. they are:
1. how do i change the amount of a item in a shop? 2. how do i change the price of a item in the shop? 3. how do i change the max hit of a item? 4. on the most clients i saw the admins+ have a bank with the most items like 2147 times or sumthing. how ill add this :confused:
please help me

item.title: Some questions the professionals please help me!
item.dc:creator: @Ecko Ecko
item.description:
@Ecko wrote:

  1. Shops.xml - Find whatever shop you are looking for in the list and find your item ID and edit the # that is in the tags.
  2. ItemDef.xml - Locate your item ID and change the # that is in the tags.
  3. There’s no such thing as a max hit of an item. If you look in ItemWieldableDef.xml, you can find your item ID and all the weapon/armor/etc points it adds.
  4. If you’re admin, look in your CommandHandler.java for what command is there to spawn items. Usually it’s ::item

Read full topic
item.source: Some questions the professionals please help me!
